title: HTTP Response Splitting (CRLF injection) due to headers overflow

profile.name: Twitter
profile.about: Twitter helps you create and share ideas and information instantly, without barriers.

activities.message: Looks like HackerOne is not capable of handling such a large URL. Please copy-paste the PoC to test.

activities.message:
Thank you for your report. We believe it may be a valid security issue and will investigate it further. It could take some time to find and update the root cause for an issue, so we thank you for your patience.

Thank you for helping keep Twitter secure!

activities.message: I can confirm this is fixed.
Is it eligible for a bounty?

Hey @filedescriptor

I believe this issue is definitely eligible. Twitter's payment schedule is usually around Friday so i expect you to get an update about the reward at that time.

Hope this helps.

activities.message: Thanks for updating me. I was thinking since jimio left Twitter and last week was a holiday so this might be forgotten.
